com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers
[Groovy] Class SSHConnector

java.lang.Object
  com.yelllabs.soapy.helpers.SSHConnector

class SSHConnector
extends java.lang.Object

brief:
Simple class to connect to any server using SSH. This code is based on a example given along with SSHj lib https://github.com/shikhar/sshj
Authors:
Janusz Kowalczyk 38115ja

Constructor Summary
SSHConnector(java.lang.String hostname, java.lang.String authPublicKeyName, org.apache.log4j.Logger log)

@brief Default constructor which initialize SSHClient and load known hosts.
 
Method Summary
java.util.Map exec(java.lang.String... commands)

@brief Connects via SSH and executes a list of given commands

Constructor Detail

SSHConnector

SSHConnector(java.lang.String hostname, java.lang.String authPublicKeyName, org.apache.log4j.Logger log)
brief:
Default constructor which initialize SSHClient and load known hosts.
Parameters:
hostname - A hostname to which you want to connect, if "" or null then localhost is used
authPublicKeyName - Name of public key used to authenticate, if "" or null then System.getProperty("user.name") is used.
log - A log4j Logger

 
Method Detail

exec

java.util.Map exec(java.lang.String... commands)
brief:
Connects via SSH and executes a list of given commands
Parameters:
commands - A varArgs of commands to execute
Returns:
A Map of command output in format: [ [command, commandOutput], [command2. command2Output],...]
